title: Tech's crackdown on Russian propaganda is a geopolitical high-wire act - NPR
content:
1. Tech's crackdown on Russian propaganda is a geopolitical high-wire act  NPR
  2. Ukraine War Tests the Power of Tech Giants  The New York Times
  3. Big Tech's Support for Ukraine Recasts Industry's Global Role  CNET
  4. Big tech grapples with Russian state media, propaganda  PBS NewsHour
  5. What Meta, Google and other tech giants are doing about Russia's invasion of Ukraine  EL PA√çS in English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Facebook, Google, Apple and Microsoft are taking steps to curb Russian propaganda, but they don't want to be kicked out of the country and limit Russians' access to their platforms.
